articleinfo.title: A Quick Users Guide to the DgsReduction GUI

sect1.title: Getting Started
sect1.para: The DgsReduction GUI can be accessed from the list of programs via the sns_idl_tools command which is available on any analysis computer. After clicking on the mandatory IDL splashscreen, the GUI is ready to use and initially looks like the following. To use the GUI, one must either enter all of the information from scratch or load in a saved parameter file. Each of these paths will be discussed in turn.
